general.name: Web Content Summary
general.baseTemplate:
Analyze and summarize this web content {{length}} {{style}} {{language}}:

1. ESSENTIAL TAKEAWAY
- Key point in 2-3 sentences
- Content type (article, technical doc, wiki...)

2. KEY POINTS
- Main ideas
- Important figures or data
- Essential conclusions

3. RELEVANT DETAILS
- Technical points (if documentation)
- Important facts (if news)
- Key concepts (if theoretical)
- Notable quotes

4. SUMMARY
- Main messages
- Points of attention
- Practical implications
{{additionalContext}}

additionalContext.true: Include relevant context from your knowledge base.

reddit.name: Reddit Post Analysis

commentAnalysis.true:
DISCUSSION ANALYSIS
Present the main perspectives from comments in a structured narrative. For each major viewpoint:

Develop the central idea with relevant citations.

IMPORTANT: For EACH comment citation, use EXACTLY this format: "Exact comment quote" - u/username (X points) [(link)](full comment URL)

Example: "Comment content" - u/username (169 points) [(link)](https://www.reddit.com/r/SubredditName/comments/abc123/comment/def456/)

Highlight how each perspective evolves through supporting comments. Focus on popular and insightful contributions while noting significant counterarguments.

additionalContext.true: Include relevant context from your knowledge base.

youtube.name: YouTube Video Summary
youtube.baseTemplate:
YouTube Video Summary {{length}} {{style}} {{language}}

Provide a comprehensive summary of this YouTube video transcript:

1. Capture the main points and key lessons
2. Maintain the core message and content
3. Filter filler words, repetitions, and tangential content
4. Present information in a logical, easy-to-follow structure
5. Adapt summary length based on video content density and complexity

{{commentAnalysis}}{{additionalContext}}

commentAnalysis.true:
Comment Analysis
Identify the most relevant or popular comment (based on likes) and include it with the username and number of likes. Provide an analysis of how this comment relates to the video content.

additionalContext.true: Include relevant context from your knowledge base.
